The user jumps up into the air, lands a couple powerful physical attacks, grabs there opponent, and powerbombs them.

== Trivia ==
* As with many of the techniques of [[Kumogakure]] [[shinobi]], this technique has an English name given kanji that somewhat match the pronunciation. Usually, the kanji would be pronounced as ''Hatsuhayō Bakudan''.
* "[[Wikipedia:Powerbomb|Power Bomb]]" is also a [[Wikipedia:Professional wrestling|professional wrestling]] move.
